hero.title: Full Stack

about.title: About
about.heading: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm a full stack developer with experience in creating modern and responsive web applications. My passion lies in solving complex problems and transforming ideas into high-quality digital products.
about.paragraph2: Currently studying Systems Analysis and Development, I have worked with various technologies and frameworks, always seeking to learn and adapt to new market trends.
about.name: Vitor de Melo Jacques

skills.title: My
skills.heading: Technologies and tools I master
skills.description: Throughout my journey as a developer, I have acquired proficiency in various technologies and tools that allow me to create complete and efficient solutions.

job1.title: Full Stack Developer
job1.description: Development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js and MongoDB. Leading a team of 3 developers and implementing CI/CD practices.

job2.title: Frontend Developer
job2.description: Creating responsive and accessible interfaces for various clients. Working with React, Vue.js and modern design systems.

edu1.title: Systems Analysis and Development
edu1.description: Education focused on software development, system architecture and agile methodologies.

edu2.title: Full Stack Web Development Course
edu2.description: Intensive 6-month program covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js and databases.

project1.title: E-commerce Website
project1.description: Complete e-commerce platform with admin panel, online payments and inventory management system.
project1.shortDesc: Complete platform with admin panel and payments

project2.title: Fitness App
project2.description: Mobile app for tracking workouts, nutrition and physical progress with community features.

project3.title: Task Management System
project3.description: Task and project management system with real-time collaboration features and productivity analysis.

project4.title: AI Chatbot
project4.description: Intelligent chatbot with natural language processing for customer service and support automation.

project5.title: Dashboard Analytics
project5.description: Data analysis dashboard with interactive visualizations and customizable reports for businesses.

project6.title: Travel Guide App
project6.description: Travel guide app with interactive maps, personalized recommendations and real-time information.
